name: Ningyo Heart
description:
''Ningyo'' is a word for doll in Japan. Ningyo Heart is a journey of a man through a pit of hell and horror, in search for the beloved ones as well as a journey of finding his true self. The main theme in this horror game is friendship, romance & horror. Game play will focus on puzzle solving & survival horror (run and chase event).

Features in this full version are :
1. Heartbeat sensor.
2. Be a guy and play with lots of dolls.
3. Intensify horror and jump scares.
4. Tons of boss fight with puzzle mechanism.
5. 2 possible epic endings!
6. 2 hidden secrets (doll maker story & Kana story).
